titleStmt.title: The prophecy of the spirit of love set forth by H.N. and by him perused anew and more distinctly declared ; translated out of Base-Almain into English.
titleStmt.author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?

titleStmt.title: The prophecy of the spirit of love set forth by H.N. and by him perused anew and more distinctly declared ; translated out of Base-Almain into English.
titleStmt.author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?

notesStmt.note: Bound with incomplete copy of his Introduction to the holy understanding of the the glasse of righteousnesse, consisting of pp. 101-284 [i.e. 363], with running title: An introduction to the glasse of righteousnesse.
Imperfect: stained and torn, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
